Class AddFlightPopupController

public class AddFlightPopupController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller class for third module popup screen window - Air Traffic

Author:
Adrian Borcz

    • AddFlightPopupController

      public AddFlightPopupController()

  • Method Details

    • closeAddFlightPopup

      public void closeAddFlightPopup()
      Closes movable popup window which allows user to insert new flight to database. Method assigned to a button "Add"

    • isDepartureDateEarlierThenArrivalDate

      public boolean isDepartureDateEarlierThenArrivalDate​(java.lang.String departureDate, java.lang.String arrivalDate, java.lang.String departureTime, java.lang.String arrivalTime)
      Checks if given departure date and time is earlier then arrival date and time
      Parameters:
      departureDate - flight departure date
      arrivalDate - flight arrival date
      departureTime - flight departure time
      arrivalTime - flight arrival time
      Returns:
      true if departure date and time is earlier then arrival date and time else returns false

    • insertFlight

      public java.lang.String insertFlight​(java.lang.String departurePlace, java.lang.String departureDate, java.lang.String departureTime, java.lang.String destination, java.lang.String arrivalDate, java.lang.String arrivalTime, java.lang.String price)
      Inserts new flight record to database
      Parameters:
      departurePlace - flight departure place
      departureDate - flight departure date
      departureTime - flight departure time
      destination - flight destination place
      arrivalDate - flight arrival date
      arrivalTime - flight arrival time
      price - flight price for a single ticket
      Returns:
      method result message as string

    • addFlightOnAction

      public void addFlightOnAction()
      Gathers data from text fields, then calls insertFlight method

    • receiveParentModuleObject

      public void receiveParentModuleObject​(M3_AirTrafficController parentModule)
      Saves instance of parent controller object to private variable (parent means scene controller from where AddFlightController was called)
      Parameters:
      parentModule - third module parent controller - Air Traffic instance
